entry.title: New Faculty: Anwar Hithnawi joins SysNet

link.title: New Faculty: Anwar Hithnawi joins SysNet

entry.content: Anwar Hithnawi will join the Department of Computer Science & the Systems & Networks Group (SysNet) as assistant professor in January 2025. For more information, read the faculty spotlight post at the department’s news site.
entry.summary: Anwar Hithnawi will join the Department of Computer Science & the Systems & Networks Group (SysNet) as assistant professor in January 2025. For more information, read the faculty spotlight post at the department’s news site.

entry.title: Christina Christodoulakis (PhD) wants to make open data easier to access and use

link.title: Christina Christodoulakis (PhD) wants to make open data easier to access and use

entry.content: 2024 PhD graduate Christina Christodoulakis has worked to improve the ways data can be analyzed, integrated, and searched. She goes into more details in this spotlight.
entry.summary: 2024 PhD graduate Christina Christodoulakis has worked to improve the ways data can be analyzed, integrated, and searched. She goes into more details in this spotlight.

entry.title: CentML startup led by Gennady Pekhimenko provides cost-effective machine learning solutions to companies

link.title: CentML startup led by Gennady Pekhimenko provides cost-effective machine learning solutions to companies

entry.content: CentML founded by a team including CS faculty, PhD students & alumni, the company sprung from research at Gennady Pekhimenko’s lab, EcoSystem. Read more about it on this news spotlight.
entry.summary: CentML founded by a team including CS faculty, PhD students & alumni, the company sprung from research at Gennady Pekhimenko’s lab, EcoSystem. Read more about it on this news spotlight.

entry.title: New faculty spotlight: Niv Dayan
entry.content: Get to know Niv Dayan who joined the Dept. of Computer Science and SysNet in January 2023 in this spotlight.
entry.summary: Get to know Niv Dayan who joined the Dept. of Computer Science and SysNet in January 2023 in this spotlight.

entry.title: New faculty spotlight: Qizhen Zhang
entry.content: Get to know Qizhen Zhang who joined the Dept. of Computer and Mathematical Sciences at UTSC, and SysNet in August 2023 via this spotlight.
entry.summary: Get to know Qizhen Zhang who joined the Dept. of Computer and Mathematical Sciences at UTSC, and SysNet in August 2023 via this spotlight.

entry.title: New faculty spotlight: Gururaj Saileshwar
entry.content: Get to know Gururaj Saileshwar who joined the Dept. of Mathematical and Computational Sciences (UTSC) and the tri-campus graduate Dept. of Computer Science, as well as, SysNet in August 2023. Read more at the department spotlight.
entry.summary: Get to know Gururaj Saileshwar who joined the Dept. of Mathematical and Computational Sciences (UTSC) and the tri-campus graduate Dept. of Computer Science, as well as, SysNet in August 2023. Read more at the department spotlight.

entry.title: U of T researchers leverage AI to decipher lung health from speech

link.title: U of T researchers leverage AI to decipher lung health from speech

entry.content: PhD student Sejal Bhalla developed speech analysis software, alongside a team of computer scientists and clinicians, that uses AI to detect changes in vocal characteristics among patients diagnosed with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease.
entry.summary: PhD student Sejal Bhalla developed speech analysis software, alongside a team of computer scientists and clinicians, that uses AI to detect changes in vocal characteristics among patients diagnosed with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease.

entry.title: Nandita Vijaykumar and Igor Gilitschenski win 2022 Sony Focused Research Award

link.title: Nandita Vijaykumar and Igor Gilitschenski win 2022 Sony Focused Research Award

entry.content: Nandita Vijaykumar and Igor Gilitschenski have jointly received a 2022 Sony Focused Research Award. The award provides funding for “pioneering research that could drive new technologies, industries and the future.” Read more about it in this post.
entry.summary: Nandita Vijaykumar and Igor Gilitschenski have jointly received a 2022 Sony Focused Research Award. The award provides funding for “pioneering research that could drive new technologies, industries and the future.” Read more about it in this post.

entry.title: Gennady Pekhimenko promoted to Associate Professor with tenure

link.title: Gennady Pekhimenko promoted to Associate Professor with tenure

entry.content: Gennady Pekhimenko has been promoted to the rank of Associate Professor with tenure.
entry.summary: Gennady Pekhimenko has been promoted to the rank of Associate Professor with tenure.

entry.title: Eyal de Lara appointed Chair and Graduate Chair of Department of Computer Science

link.title: Eyal de Lara appointed Chair and Graduate Chair of Department of Computer Science

entry.content: Professor Eyal de Lara has been appointed Chair and Graduate Chair of the Department of Computer Science, effective July 1, 2022 until June 30, 2027.
entry.summary: Professor Eyal de Lara has been appointed Chair and Graduate Chair of the Department of Computer Science, effective July 1, 2022 until June 30, 2027.
